question: You have lost your student identification card. This has created some problems for you.Write a letter to the director of student services. In your letter-advising them of your situation.-explain how this is affecting you.-request a new card.
text: I am masoumeh Dehbashi a freshman in the Finance faculty of your university.I am writing this letter in order to claim that I have unfortunately lost my ID card involve requesting to issue a letter one as a consequence of the necessity of it  attending further exams.

First and foremost It is worth noting that I have lost my all documents including my university identification and all my lecture approvals including my back bag in the north way train station last Friday when I was travelling to Toronto to attend my rutin classes, I just had left my bag for few minutes and when I came back I did not find them anymore conclusively.

On the other hand, It is undeniable that I could not make the scene  in this semester's final exams which will have been taken in less than two weeks thus, I would have gotten into a huge hassle if the second card had not reached me on time.
correspondingly,I would deeply appreciate it if you put some acceleration in the process of reissuing the new evidence.
I would wait for your kind response.
